concept.title: Reentering a call with all people code
concept.shortdesc: The code below illustrates the example shown.

section.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!DOCTYPE task PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DITA Task//EN" "http://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/v1.1/OS/dtd/task.dtd"> <task id="ReenteringACallWithAllPeople" xml:lang="en-us"> <title>Reentering a call with all people</title> <taskbody> <steps> <step> <cmd>Lift handset or press Speaker.</cmd> </step> <step> <cmd>Press Conference or Hold/Callback.</cmd> </step> </steps> </taskbody> </task>
